name: Laser Run
description:
Running is important!

As a healthy robot you take a stroll to your favorite laboratory to practice your running.

But, the laboratory was changed into a death trap! Laser beams and other traps will try to kill you! As a fellow runner, you do not care and only want to make the better fitness you can.

Tools used: Unity and Aseprite

Wild Box Studio - Gabriel Jouet

Music done by Francis L'Ectomorphe - Soundcloud Itch
